body.p:
You can use the Short Description action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Content generation category to ask the AI Positron to create and insert a shortdesc element in a DITA topic based on the selected content.

You can hover over the Short Description menu item to show a configuration widget which allows you to configure the Style and Maximum number of sentences to generate. This configuration choice is not available in the WebAuthor in-browser editor.

An AI action called Short description is incredibly useful to end users because it allows them to quickly and concisely summarize various types of content. This AI action generates a brief and informative summary that saves time and provides an overview of the content. It eliminates the need for users to manually read through lengthy texts or descriptions, enabling them to quickly grasp the main points.
Open the topic and invoke the Short Description action.
